title: HIRING: Financial Advisors
company_info: People-first advisory services begin with strong relationships, care and support, and not numbers on a spreadsheet. Relationships from the heart, solutions you can trust. We believe that financial solutions begin not on a sheet of paper, but from putting people first and foremost, before everything else. Discover the Orizal difference now.
job_category: Banking and Finance, Customer Service, Insurance, Sales / Retail
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Orizal is a group of financial advisors representing a suite of different financial services providers, enabling us to provide solutions; not products that adequately cover our clients’ specific needs at every stage in life.
We are looking for a Financial Advisor with a strong heart and desire to serve, to join our ambitious goal to deliver people-first financial solutions to our clients.

Orizal was founded by 2 industry veterans in the financial advisory industry in 2019, bringing together over a combined 30 years of experience at the onset. To date, 22 advisors - from new advisors to seasoned industry practitioners - have joined us from all walks of life because of our insistent approach to guide them at every step of their career.

At Orizal, we constantly put the spotlight on people, not the numbers.
That means we don’t want you to push products; but rather, provide adaptive solutions to each individual client that you get to meet, so as to build a fulfilling, rewarding and sustainable career that is a lifelong experience.
We are a young company, but already with a proven track record - our advisors have won multiple awards (like the much coveted ApfinSa and Million Dollar Round Table [MDRT]) consecutively since joining Orizal.

We’re confident that you can be next up there, receiving those awards.
We know that the hearsay is that financial advisory sounds like a “pushy” job, that “it’s hard to succeed”, and that “it’s a tough business”.

That’s because it is - if you don’t have the right environment to grow, and the right partners to help you grow. That’s Orizal.
We are actively recruiting people who are self-motivated and keen to build your own business, earning based on your hard work. If you are someone who is self-motivated, enjoys working in a collaborative team environment and keen to do meaningful work to help people, we want you!

What role(s) can I expect to handle?
Orizal offers you flexible options to grow your career right from the start. We let you choose the path that you want to take in your career, and we focus our efforts in helping you get there.
Want to eventually have and grow your own team? Our management path helps you to develop and hone your leadership skills
Want to just do financial advisory? We’ll place all our efforts to help you sharpen your advisory abilities, and give you ample directions to thrive
Something else? Our team is always open to new suggestions to grow together
What sets us apart?
We’re serious when we say that we aggressively invest in our people. Our own marketing efforts feature each and every one of our advisors, and put the focus on their individual stories / branding, which is a novel first in Singapore.

Our marketing and branding efforts to promote you

Day in the life of a financial advisor series: bit.ly/3Mcjxfw
Our social media efforts that focus on our people (not products): bit.ly/3zruq5t

Proven systems and mentorship
We leverage our industry knowledge and experience (over 30 years worth) to shortcut what works and throw out what doesn’t. Right from the get go, we offer intensive guidance and mentorship with our own in-house methodologies that:
Show you how to generate referrals and sales in a non-salesy way

Roles & Responsibilities
Global Financial Consultants (GFC) is one of Singapore’s most venerable and longest established wealth management and financial advisory businesses. Based in the heart of the financial district of Singapore, GFC is focused on providing a tailored and client-centric approach to help safeguard our clients’ financial future whilst guiding them on the path to achieve their personal financial goals and objectives. Our MAS regulated Financial Advisors pride themselves on providing professional and unbiased financial advice that helps our clients create and protect their wealth.

Due to our consistent expansion of business, we are keen to hire a new Financial Paraplanner to join our team. This is mainly an administrative role that will require a proficient and enthusiastic individual. You will be working alongside our Financial Advisors to provide support in the day to day tasks of Financial Planning and to liaise with clients. In return, we can offer you unparalleled career path potential, valuable training and experience in the world of financial services in a lively professional working environment.

There will be a PA element to the role including arranging follow ups, general administration and preparing client reports and documentation for meetings. The ideal candidate will therefore need to be meticulous and detail-oriented ensuring that there are no oversights. We are looking for people who are driven and have displayed an active interest in the financial services sector. This will be an opportunity for the right candidate to learn a great deal about the industry and grow and expand quickly.

Why GFC?:

- Training & Support Provided – We ensure that you’re given opportunities to succeed
- Career Advancement Opportunities
- Quarterly Team-Building Initiatives
- Close-Knit Environment
